principles: Fail-closed: if any critical guardrail fails, block discretionary growth spend and net-new headcount
Protect retention: never cut retention-critical CS/Product capacity when NRR trigger is watch/fail
Reallocate before cutting: shift from low-ROI acquisition to retention and proven channels first
Bands over points: decisions based on ranges and multi-signal corroboration

allowed_if.allow: Proceed with approved hiring plan; add up to +1–2 critical roles/month if Ro40 is PASS and CAC payback is PASS
Backfills only + explicitly retention-critical roles; CFO approval required

blocked_if.block: All net-new hires and non-critical backfills; exception requires CEO+CFO signoff and written ROI case

exceptions.retention_protection: If T5 is WATCH/FAIL, CS/Product roles that directly mitigate churn are allowed even during cost containment, but must be offset by cuts elsewhere

gates.scope: Marketing + sales variable spend, tools, agencies

allowed_if.when: T7_CAC_PAYBACK PASS and T6_PIPELINE_COVERAGE PASS and (T1 or T2) is PASS/WATCH
allowed_if.allow: Scale spend +5–15% in proven segments; keep experiment budget capped (2–5% of GTM spend)

blocked_if.block: Freeze scaling; cut lowest ROI channels 10–30%; require channel-level ROI proof for reinstatement
Immediate discretionary GTM spend freeze except for commitments; re-approve monthly

required_controls: Discount governance: set discount ceilings by segment; CFO approval for exceptions
Quota capacity check: ensure rep capacity aligns with pipeline coverage thresholds

allowed_if.allow: Prioritize retention-critical roadmap; limit new big-bet initiatives to those with quantified retention or upsell impact

blocked_if.block: Pause non-core R&D; focus on cost-to-serve, reliability, and upsell enablers
Block any roadmap that risks churn; mandate churn-reduction tiger team and reliability focus

gates.scope: All non-labor spend (software, cloud commitments, contractors outside product)

allowed_if.allow: Renewals allowed; new spend requires ROI case if >$5k/month

blocked_if.block: Renegotiate top vendors; approve only mission-critical spend; target 10–20% savings within 60 days

escalation_rules.condition: Two consecutive monthly FAILs on T1/T2
escalation_rules.action: Board-level review; adopt stronger cost program; revise guidance narrative

escalation_rules.condition: Four consecutive weekly FAILs on T4
escalation_rules.action: Activate financing/strategic options workstream; implement immediate burn reduction plan
